page.title: 01OUR D BLOCK
page.content: Our chosen area is mainly agricultural with no forestry,although there are patches of forest in the surrounding districts.The arable land mainly produces wheat,barley,oil-seed-rape, sugar-beet and potatoes.Farmers are reducing their cattle-raising because of poor economic returns.Grazing land is increasingly used by sheep or is ploughed for planting with arable crops. The{Newark}to{Grimsby}railway link passes through but no longer serves the village.Communication by the main {A158}road brings much traffic past the school making it difficult to cross the road in the summer-time.Many vehicles are going to and from the coastal resorts. To serve the main road traffic there are three filling stations and two hotels.
